name: Daily Delivery
info: Help the postal service deliver important packages and messages around the village. Complete your delivery route efficiently to keep the community connected.
dialogs: Thanks for volunteering for delivery duty!
These packages and letters need to reach their destinations today.
The village depends on reliable delivery service.
Great work! The recipients are very grateful.
You're making excellent time on your route.
The village stays connected thanks to people like you.
decline: I can't carry that many packages right now.
